channel.title: Sadowski, Caitlin on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sadowski, Caitlin on Chege's Blog

item.title: Productivity for Software Engineers
item.description: Self-Monitoring My current system: Set objectives for the week. Set daily agenda. Track estimation times vs. actual time, and explain discrepancies. At the end of the day, evaluate myself using function points . Also note any code reviews done on that day. Areas that can be improved: How do I make the data on time estimated vs. time taken actionable? How granular/strict should my tracking get? Sometimes I skip setting agenda so that I can move fast.
